metadata.title: Linux "libclntsh.so.11.1 cannot open shared object file no such file or directory"解决方案

summary:
`Ubuntu 14.04`
`node v4.2.3`
`oracledb v1.4.0`
在正常安装好`Node.js`和`oracledb`,之后,用到oracledb的那一步就开始提示这个错误
